show.title: kalluri Kaadhal kadhai
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/BxEq4q
show.description: A wealthy businessman marries the woman he loves, only to discover she doesn't share his feelings. They strike a secret deal to pose as friends in college for two years—if she falls for him by then, they'll stay married; if not, they’ll go their separate ways.
show.description_secondary: A wealthy businessman marries the woman he loves, only to discover she doesn't share his feelings. They strike a secret deal to pose as friends in college for two years—if she falls for him by then, they'll stay married; if not, they’ll go their separate ways.
